'''''Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds''''' is the [[Liyue]] Chapter [[soundtrack]] album.<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1324563046904197121 Genshin Impact's Liyue Chapter OST — "Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds" is out now.]</ref>

It features a total of 69 tracks composed by [[w:c:mihoyo:Chen Zhiyi|Yu-Peng Chen]] of [[HOYO-MiX]]. The music was recorded by the {{w|London Philharmonic Orchestra}} and the {{w|Shanghai Symphony Orchestra}} with special guest folk musicians at AIR Studios and the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra Hall respectively.

The album is divided by three discs: ''Glazed Moon Over the Tides'', ''Shimmering Sea of Clouds and Moonlight'', and ''Battles of Liyue''.
